label: AuthoritativeSignatoryPerson
comment: A person who is authorized to sign a document, such as a customs officer or other government official.

datatypeProperties.comment: A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.

objectProperties.comment: An academic qualification attained by this authoritative signatory person.

referencedBy.comment: A person specified to sign on behalf of this trade party.
